data.eml:eml: A new species of masked-owl (Aves: Strigiformes: Tytonidae) from Seram, Indonesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jønsson, Knud Andreas, Poulsen, Michael Køie, Haryoko, Tri, Reeve, Andrew Hart, Fabre, Pierre-Henri (2013): A new species of masked-owl (Aves: Strigiformes: Tytonidae) from Seram, Indonesia. Zootaxa 3635 (1): 51-61, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.1.5
